Text:
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/7126-The-Official-Windows-7-Repository

In that link is a step-by-step guide to installing Windows 7 (x86 and x64) for free. Torrenting is a great way to get yourself a cease-and-desist letter from Microsoft.

And by torrenting I mean shitty TPB torrents. I was surprised to find the website at first as well... but it's legit. It has Windows 8 and Windows XP too, along with cracks. In the software section is even a link to Visual Studio 2012 Pro. Pretty cool stuff.
